message: Hi Bob, I'm looking to sell this product, and I think it would be perfect for you. I'm asking for $160, which reflects its true value.
I'm interested in the product, but $160 is a bit too high for me. I'm willing to pay $100.
Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While I had a higher price in mind, I'm willing to come down to $130. I believe this is a fair price that reflects the value of the product.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $130 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to pay $90.
